ranking.description: An agentic skills framework & software development methodology that works.
ranking.description_ja: An agentic skills framework & software development methodology that works.
ranking.readme_summary: Superpowers Superpowers is a complete software development workflow for your coding agents, built on top of a set of composable "skills" and some initial instructions that make sure your agent uses them. How it works It starts from the moment you fire up your coding agent. As soon as it sees that you're building something, it *doesn't* just jump into trying to write code
ranking.readme_summary_ja: Superpowers Superpowers is a complete software development workflow for your coding agents, built on top of a set of composable "skills" and some initial instructions that make sure your agent uses them. How it works It starts from the moment you fire up your coding agent. As soon as it sees that you're building something, it *doesn't* just jump into trying to write code

ranking.description: A powerful Telegram bot that provides remote access to Claude Code, enabling developers to interact with their projects from anywhere with full AI assistance and session persistence.
ranking.description_ja: A powerful Telegram bot that provides remote access to Claude Code, enabling developers to interact with their projects from anywhere with full AI assistance and session persistence.
ranking.readme_summary: Claude Code Telegram Bot ![License: MIT](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT) ![Python 3.10+](https://www.python.org/downloads/) A Telegram bot that gives you remote access to Claude Code. Chat naturally with Claude about your projects from anywhere -- no terminal commands needed. What is this?
